definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send

sentences.english: Americans send red hearts to people they love.
sentences.chinese: 美国人给他们所爱的人寄送红心。

sentences.english: Lockard sent the package anonymously, just on a whim.
sentences.chinese: 因此洛卡德先生一时兴起，寄送了一个匿名的包裹。

sentences.english: Normally, you will have to pay for the cost of the CD and delivery.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下，你需要支付光盘的成本费和寄送的费用。

sentences.english: Basically though, sending your work through the postal service does not provide any protection to your work at all.
sentences.chinese: 通过邮政服务寄送作品，并不能为作品提供任何保护。

sentences.english: Men in the post office classify mail according to places it is to go.
sentences.chinese: 邮局里的人员将信件按寄送地点分类。

sentences.english: Sending a bouquet of flowers costs more. (Press-Enterprise, California)
sentences.chinese: 寄送一束花收费更高了。

sentences.english: Americans usually send cards through the mail system or in a computer message.
sentences.chinese: 美国人通常会通过邮局或电子邮件寄送卡片。

sentences.english: I'd like to send this package by home delivery.
sentences.chinese: 我想用宅急便寄送包裹。

sentences.english: Give a thank-you card to the bus driver or the barista who serves you your latte.
sentences.chinese: 为公共汽车司机和给你调制咖啡的人寄送一张感谢卡。

sentences.english: There is a special enclosure for you in the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 信中为你寄送了一份特殊附件。

sentences.english: In order to enlarge the market, we are sending you our offer for our new products as follows.
sentences.chinese: 为了扩大市场，现向你方寄送我方新产品的报盘如下。

sentences.english: You should send one copy of the shipping documents to the port of destination together with the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 装船同时贵方应将货运单据副本寄送目的港。

sentences.english: This letter is mailed through auto-mailing system, please do not reply.
sentences.chinese: 本邮件是由系统自动寄送，请勿直接回复。

sentences.english: Note that no follow-up letter will be sent.
sentences.chinese: 请注意这样的信是不会被重新寄送。

sentences.english: Can I deliver the file by express?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用快递寄送这份文件吗？

sentences.english: Mail your return by certified mail or use a delivery service.
sentences.chinese: 通过保证邮件或速递服务来寄送申报表。

definition: to forward (a message, letter, article etc)
to reject (visa application etc)/(commerce) to return to sender/item returned to sender
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
